row.process:
: SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_ENDPOINT_STATUS# = "" : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
: IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_ENDPOINT_STATUS*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_ENDPOINT_STATUS" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_ENDPOINT_STATUS# = &VALUE# : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_ENDPOINT_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW
